postData.contentHtml:
Information about my dissertation defense.

Preliminary Date & Time

Week of July 7—11, 2025

Committee

  • Clément Aubert, major advisor, Augusta University
  • Martin Avanzini, Centre Inria d’Université Côte d’Azur, France
  • Yuyan Bao, Augusta University
  • Bogdan Chlebus, Augusta University
  • Harley Eades III, Augusta University

Tentative Timeline

Date Description
✔️ January 2025 Approval for alternative template
✔️ March 4, 2025 Deadline to complete and submit "Graduation Application Form"
March 2025 Schedule Defense
• With committee members
• Through the office of The Graduate School Dean
May 5, 2025 Submit dissertation draft to Major Advisor
May 13, 2025 Enroll for summer semester
June 2025 Major Advisor approval of draft
June 2025 Room reservation
June 2, 2025 Submit dissertation draft to the Advisory Committee
June 23, 2025 Submit "Faculty Agreement for Final Oral Exam Form"
June 23, 2025 Submit "Dissertation Approval Form"
June 23, 2025 Submit electronic copy of the Defense Announcement
June 23, 2025 Defense announcement to faculty and students (by student)
July 7-11, 2025 Oral Defense
July 14, 2025 Tasks and forms 1 week after defense
• Submit "ETD Submission for Publication Approval Form"
• Complete Graduate Questionnaire
• Complete and submit Survey of Earned Doctorates online
• Schedule exit interview with The Graduate School
July 23, 2025 Submit all final documents and forms
• Electronic version of final corrected dissertation
• Submit dissertation to ProQuest

Timeline compiled from/based on the various documents below.

Documents & Links

Abbreviations:
TGS = The Graduate School
SCCS = School of Computer & Cyber Sciences

Documents marked with "☹" require login.

Dissertation guidelines

  • Electronic Theses and Dissertations (ETD) - Library resources
  • Preparation booklet v. 2024 - The Graduate School guidelines

Policies

  • Dissertation defense by TGS
  • Oran Exam Procedures by TGS
  • "Final Oral Examination" excerpt from TGS Handbook (p. 13)
  • "Dissertation Defense" excerpt from the SCCS PhD Timeline ☹
  • TGS Defense Schedule/Calendar

Required Forms

  • Faculty Agreement Form Date and Time of Final Oral Examination
  • Dissertation Approval Form Doctor of Philosophy Degree
  • ETD Submission for Publication Approval Form For Doctoral Students
  • Defense Announcement Template
  • Summerville Graduation Application
